replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content: Teleportbackessentials.backAllow access to the /back command.Teleportbackessentials.back.ondeathGive this permission to allow players to use /back to go to their death spotTeleportbackessentials.keepxpAllows the user to keep their exp on death, instead of dropping it.

jiuerd 发表于 2014-12-2 08:14
什么意思？求翻译解释一下

jiuerd 发表于 2014-12-2 08:23
权限节点；
用法：
mangaddp 组 -essentials.back
mangaddp 组 -essentials.back
  这个是禁止BACK的权限还是允许back的权限呢？

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
609799812 发表于 2014-12-2 08:25
mangaddp 组 -essentials.back
  这个是禁止BACK的权限还是允许back的权限呢？
权限节点前面有“-”；
这是给负权限，就是禁止的意思；
可以避免因为权限来源于继承的情况下出现“没有该权限”的提示；
